meaning_str.bing:
adv. 非常；许多；大量；（与动词连用）非常
n. 批；命运；全部；全体
pron. 许多；大量
v. 抽签；划分(土地等)；分批；分堆(出售商品)
网络. 左枕横(left occipito-transverse)；罗得；批次

非常；许多；大量；（与动词连用）非常
抽签；划分(土地等)；分批；分堆(出售商品)

（a lot）很；非常；在很大程度上；在更大程度上；常常；经常；很多；许多；大量
签；阄；抽签；抓阄；命运；运气；处境；一块地；一块地皮；场地；全部；整个；全体成员；拍卖品；一批人；一组东西；（同一类人或事物的）数量；（Lot）罗得（人名）；洛特省（法国）；洛特河（法国南部的河流）

sogou-gaokao.n: 界定场地[出现1次)];全体; 全部[出现0次)];签; 抽签[出现0次)];命运[出现0次)]

sogou-zhongkao.adv: 非常; 很多地[出现36次)]

1.en: Even if war were declared, and it were my lot to go, I would grab the bayonet and plunge it, plunge it up to the hilt.
1.cn: 即使宣战，我又命中注定要上前线，我也会抓起刺刀去戮，一直戮到刀柄。

2.en: Like a lot of young people, I was eager to get out of the rural community where I was raised and move to the city.
2.cn: 和许多年轻人也一样，我渴望走出抚养了我的农村地区，搬到城市。

3.en: Michelangelo , you know a lot about him. Life's work, political aspirations, him and the pope, sexual orientations, the whole works, right?
3.cn: 有关米开朗基罗，你知道很多，他的政治抱负、他和教皇…性向，所有作品，对吗？

0.en: Well, this is certainly a lot to think about.
0.cn: 好吧，还有许多事需要考虑。

1.en: When too many cheap mortgages were being sold in 2007, a lot of people didn't know what was going on and a lot of others just followed the crowd.
1.cn: 当许多便宜的抵押品在2007年被贩卖时，有许多人都不知道怎么一回事，而只是跟着大多。数人的步调。

2.en: There were a lot of divorce handovers at the café. Sorry.
2.cn: 在咖啡店我见过许多离异夫妻交接，抱歉。

3.en: I notice that you've been trusted with a lot of rather important responsibilities.
3.cn: 我看到你肩负了许多重要职责。

4.en: Well, there was a lot of action, and the story moved along at a brisk pace.
4.cn: 书里有许多打斗场景,情节跌宕起伏。

5.en: And a lot of powerful men with a desire to preserve peace and protect life.
5.cn: 许多掌权者都想要保卫和平，保护生命。

6.en: But it also leaves us a lot of trouble in particular things like envy and our happiness.
6.cn: 但它也带来许多负面影响特别是嫉妒和我们的满足感。

7.en: You would want that? Well, I would want Chumhum back. That would solve a lot of my issues.
7.cn: 你想这样吗？我想签回查查网，这能替我解决许多问题。

8.en: And you know, I've been through a lot in the past six days, five minutes, 27-and-a-half seconds.
8.cn: 你知道，我过去6天5分钟27秒半，经历了许多事情。

9.en: Why didn't he fight? Why did he allow himself to be sacrificed? I ask myself that question a lot.
9.cn: 他为什么不反抗，他为什么自愿牺牲，我自问过许多遍。

10.en: And also lot of the traditional business hate the Internet, because they destroy their business.
10.cn: 而许多传统企业讨厌互联网，因为互联网毁掉了他们的生意。

11.en: We are the cause of a lot of those myths, but I promise my mother was just as human as you or I.
11.cn: 我们是许多神话的起源，但我向你保证我妈妈是和你我一样的人类。

12.en: Thirty years I've been doing this and I've seen a lot of other games come and go. Kind of sad.
12.cn: 这三十年来我都在破坏东西我看到过许多其他游戏来来去去，有点难过。

13.en: I have to have someone to take Will's place anyway. Our firms are fighting on a lot of fronts.
13.cn: 威尔的位置总是要找人顶上的。我们两家律所在许多方面都有利益冲突。

14.en: Like this one birthday I came home from my cello lesson and I saw a lot of strange cars parked out front.
14.cn: 有一次生日，我上完大提琴课回来，看见外面停着许多陌生的轿车。

15.en: You know, a lot of scientists believe that making contact with other life-forms would probably not end well for us.
15.cn: 许多科学家认为与其他生命体有接触，可能对人类造成巨大灾难。

16.en: And as poor as my family was, we still were a lot better off than a lot of your families, who not only had to struggle through poverty but had to fight racism as well.
16.cn: 虽然我家挺穷的，但还是比在座的许多家庭宽裕不少，你们不仅要和贫穷斗争，还得和种族歧视斗争。

17.en: Are you thinking of joining? Both my partners are in clubs. They've drummed up a lot of business. Maybe I...
17.cn: 你想加入吗？我的两个合作伙伴都在俱乐部里，他们招徕了许多生意。也许我……

18.en: You're saying you didn't blackmail them? I pressure a lot of people, Tom. That's part of politics. But never those two.
18.cn: 你是说你没胁迫过他们？我曾对许多人施压，汤姆，这是政治的一部分，但从没威胁过他们。

19.en: Hey, Alex. This isn't as pretty as the front. We got nothing to hide, but the welcome wagon is a whole lot nicer.
19.cn: 这里，嘿，Alex，这里没前门那么好，我们没什么可隐瞒的，但前门的欢迎车厢比这好上许多。
